translation.en: [man 1] Mayday, mayday! We are under attack.
Under attack from our own people.
They just started shooting. They took out everyone.
translation.it: Hanno iniziato a sparare, sono tutti morti.

translation.en: -[man 2] Why are they doing this? -[man 1] They're ours. What's happening?
translation.it: Perché? Sono dei nostri. Che succede?

translation.en: [man 1] How many are there?
[man 2] They're everywhere! They're going for the command center.
translation.it: Sono ovunque. Mirano al Centro di Comando.

translation.en: They're going to take out the interceptors.
translation.it: Vogliono distruggere gli Interceptor. GLI STATI UNITI HANNO SOLO DUE STAZIONI

translation.en: [man 1] They're killing us, they're killing everybody!
They reached the command center. I can't hold them off!
translation.it: Sono al Centro di Comando. Non riesco a fermarli!

translation.en: [man 2] Somebody help us! Please, send help!
[man 1] We've got to call SBX-1. [man 2] We can't! They destroyed the transmitter!
translation.it: - Dobbiamo avvisare la SBX-1. - Hanno distrutto il trasmettitore.

translation.en: [man 1] This is Fort Greely. We have been overrun. Fort Greely--
translation.it: Qui Fort Greely. Abbiamo perso controllo. Fort Greely…

translation.en: [pilot] Coming up on SBX-1 now, Captain.
[pilot] SBX-1 this is Eagle 6-7.
I got your new missile system specialist here with me.
translation.it: Ho con me l'esperta di sistemi missilistici.

translation.en: Request permission to commence final approach.
[operator] Eagle 6-7 this is SBX-1, you're cleared for landing.
Welcome to the middle of nowhere.
Captain Collins, I'm Ensign Washington.
translation.it: Capitano Collins, sono la guardiamarina Washington.

translation.en: Welcome to SBX-1,
or should I say "welcome back."
-Thanks. -[Washington] Colonel's waiting for you.
I heard you grew up in Spain at a base your dad was posted at.
translation.it: So che è cresciuta nella base spagnola in cui era di stanza suo padre.

translation.en: [male voice] Come in.
Captain Collins reporting, sir.
At ease.
Good to see you again, JJ.
You remember Captain Welsh?
Yes, sir. You were just taking over when I rotated out.
translation.it: Sì, signore. È arrivato quando ho cambiato base.

translation.en: Don't you mean escaped?
[Welsh] Listen to this.
-Give us a minute, would you, Lou? -You bet.
translation.it: - Ci dai un secondo, Lou? - Certo.

translation.en: See if you can get us an update on that Russian sub.
translation.it: Dimmi se ci sono novità sul sottomarino russo.

translation.en: Well, as you can see,
everything's pretty much the way you left it.
Navy runs the boat, Army handles the missiles,
translation.it: La Marina comanda la baracca, l'Esercito i missili

translation.en: and everyone wants to be anywhere but here.
-Have you spoke with the board? -Three times.
translation.it: - Ha sentito il Consiglio? - Tre volte.

translation.en: [Collins] Showed them my record? My reviews? Everything.
translation.it: - Conosce i miei rapporti, le valutazioni? - Tutto.

translation.en: This was the best you could do?
translation.it: E non può fare di meglio?

translation.en: Sorry.
[Marshall] No, it's okay.
I thought I was done with this shit.
[Marshall] I know.
Never going to change, is it?
Thank you for taking me back.
translation.it: Grazie per avermi rivoluta con lei.

translation.en: For the record, I believed you from the start.
translation.it: Per la cronaca, io ti ho sempre creduta.

translation.en: [Washington] We got you down here.
One of our guys nabbed your old room.
translation.it: Si sono presi la sua vecchia stanza.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
Oh, ma'am?
Just want to say
all of us girls are really proud of what you did.
translation.it: che noi ragazze siamo orgogliose di ciò che ha fatto.

translation.en: What happened to you, well it's…
It's happened to a lot of us,
translation.it: È accaduto a molte di noi

translation.en: and I just wanted you to know that.
I need you in the command center with your sidearm now.
translation.it: Devi venire al Centro di Comando, armata.

translation.en: We have an active shooter situation at Fort Greely.
translation.it: C'è una sparatoria in corso a Fort Greely.

translation.en: Outsider?
No, one of ours. Looks like more than one.
translation.it: No, uno dei nostri. Anzi, più di uno, pare.

translation.en: [Collins] Interceptors secure? [Marshall] Unknown.
translation.it: - Gli Interceptor sono al sicuro? - Non si sa.

translation.en: [Collins] How bad is it?
Greely's gone dark. No calls in or out. We're getting all our information off Twitter.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso i contatti con Greely. Le informazioni ci arrivano da Twitter.

translation.en: [Marshall] Do we have Fort Greely on the line?
[soldier] Not yet, sir.
[Marshall] You know what to do.
Is Greely being jammed?
No. It's like someone turned off the system at the source.
translation.it: No, è come se avessero spento il sistema alla fonte.

translation.en: Corporal Rahul Shah. Joined us six months ago.
translation.it: Il caporale Rahul Shah, con noi da sei mesi.

translation.en: Captain. Corporal.
And you remember Beaver.
Miss me, Captain?
Not even once.
[Marshall] How's our Russian friend?
[Beaver] He's back.
Forty miles out and just sitting there like a turd in a swimming pool.
translation.it: È a 40 miglia, come uno stronzo che galleggia in piscina.

translation.en: -[Collins] What friend? -Russian attack sub.
translation.it: Amichetto russo? Un sottomarino russo ficcanaso.

translation.en: Been nosing about for months.
Our subs keep chasing him away and he keeps coming back.
translation.it: Lo allontaniamo da mesi, ma continua a tornare.

translation.en: What the hell's going on up there?
Hey. We still on for tonight?
Dude, what?
Poker. I want to whip them janitors like last time.
translation.it: Poker. Voglio stracciare di nuovo i custodi.

translation.en: -Not now, Beaver. -What's wrong with now?
We're in an emergency.
Man, this ain't no emergency.
It's one crackpot with a grudge.
I'd invite you, ma'am,
but there'll probably be a bit of locker room talk.
translation.it: ma faremo delle chiacchiere fra uomini.

translation.en: I've been practicing against some of the best players in the world
translation.it: Ho fatto pratica coi migliori giocatori al mondo

translation.en: with this little green guy. Thing's probably more powerful than this entire room.
translation.it: grazie a questo piccoletto, che forse è più potente di questa stanza.

translation.en: Great story, Beaver.
In what chapter do you shut the fuck up?
translation.it: In che capitolo chiudi quel cazzo di becco?

translation.en: Copy that, STRATCOM.
Sir, SBX-1 has just been assigned primary early warning status while Greely's offline.
translation.it: Signore, con Greely offline, la SBX-1 è la stazione di allerta primaria.

translation.en: All right, as of this moment we're the only interceptor platform
translation.it: Ok, siamo rimasti l'unica piattaforma Interceptor

translation.en: protecting the United States from a nuclear missile attack.
translation.it: a proteggere gli USA da un attacco missilistico.

translation.en: Square your shit away. Focus on the job you've been trained to do.
Sir, we sure this is not some kind of drill or emergency test--
translation.it: Signore, siamo sicuri che non sia un'esercitazione o…

translation.en: Quiet.
NSA is relaying chatter from Russia.
Kremlin just received a priority alert from the ICBM missile base in Tavlinka.
translation.it: La base missilistica ICBM a Tavlinka ha dato la massima allerta al Cremlino.

translation.en: Tavlinka site under hostile attack.
translation.it: La base di Tavlinka è sotto attacco.

translation.en: Multiple casualties.
Unauthorized missile removal.
No way.
Sixteen Topol-M mobile missiles unaccounted for.
You're saying someone stole 16 ICBMs?
translation.it: Sta dicendo che hanno rubato 16 ICBM?

translation.en: I'm not saying it. The Russians are.
translation.it: Non lo sto dicendo io, ma i russi.

translation.en: Sir, Greely goes dark and within 10 minutes a Russian base reports stolen nukes?
translation.it: Greely va offline e dieci minuti dopo rubano dei missili da una base russa?

translation.en: Look, Greely's real, but this has to be a Russian exercise.
translation.it: A Greely è tutto vero. Ma questa sarà un'esercitazione russa.

translation.en: If it were real, the Pentagon would've called us by now.
translation.it: Altrimenti il Pentagono ci avrebbe chiamati.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
We are, sir.
It just came in now, sir.
We will, sir.
[in Russian] We have 16 missiles aimed at 16 American cities.
translation.it: Abbiamo 16 missili puntati verso 16 città americane.

translation.en: After this day, America will no longer exist.
translation.it: L'America non esisterà più dopo oggi.

translation.en: Jesus.
How do you steal nuclear missiles?
translation.it: Come si rubano dei missili nucleari?

translation.en: Had to have been an inside job. You can't just walk in--
translation.it: Avranno avuto un infiltrato. Non è che entri…

translation.en: Doesn't matter how they did it. What matters is those missiles are mobile.
translation.it: Non importa come. Il punto è che sono missili mobili.

translation.en: They can hide their nukes anywhere. Our satellites won't spot them till they launch.
translation.it: Possono nasconderli ovunque, i satelliti li rileveranno solo al lancio.

translation.en: Captain.
[Marshall] JJ.
This is on us now, you understand?
[Collins] Yes, sir.
We're the only thing standing between America and Armageddon.
translation.it: Solo noi separiamo gli USA dall'Armageddon.

translation.en: You up for this?
Don't worry about me, sir.
Sorry. Had to ask.
I'll start the emergency lockdown. You do that.
I need to find Welsh and secure the HVAR codes.
translation.it: Io cerco Welsh e metto i codici HVAR al sicuro.

translation.en: Sir, wait Sir.
If they had people inside Tavlinka, and the shooters at Greely were all ours,
translation.it: Avevano degli infiltrati a Tavlinka e a Greely è stato fuoco amico,

translation.en: they might have someone… here.
translation.it: quindi potrebbero avere qualcuno… anche qui.

translation.en: Go.
[man] The keycard!
[man] The keycard! Get the keycard!
Mikael! The door. Open the door!
translation.it: Mikael! La porta. Apri la porta.

translation.en: Goddammit, you're a big boy.
Did you send the SOS?
Did you just stab that dude in the eye with your gun?
translation.it: Gli hai conficcato la pistola nell'occhio?

translation.en: Yeah. Did you send the SOS?
Yeah, I sent it. They told me to stand by.
translation.it: Sì. Mi hanno detto di aspettare.

translation.en: [Collins] How is Beaver?
Bullet clipped him. He's unconscious, but he'll be okay.
translation.it: Gli hanno sparato. Ha perso conoscenza, ma si riprenderà.

translation.en: Is that acid?
[Shah] Why would they bring acid?
Destroy the circuitry.
Make this place useless.
What are we going to do?
You want to talk about it?
Leave now and you might escape with your life.
translation.it: Vattene ora e ne uscirai vivo.

translation.en: Let me in
and you might escape with yours.
You are the terrorists who stole the missiles from Tavlinka?
translation.it: Sei il terrorista che ha rubato i missili?

translation.en: [man] You know, it would be a hell of a coincidence if I wasn't.
translation.it: Sarebbe una coincidenza incredibile se non lo fossi.

translation.en: Put one on Beaver.
And the shooters at Greely?
Subcontractors.
It's a gig economy.
Can't work at a US base without an extensive background check.
translation.it: Chi lavora in una base passa dei controlli approfonditi.

translation.en: You're telling me. The paperwork is a nightmare.
translation.it: Non dirlo a me. Che incubo le scartoffie.

translation.en: That would mean you've been planning this--
[man] For a very long time.
[Collins] How long is a very long time?
Six years.
Not going so well for you, is it?
translation.it: Non ti sta andando molto bene.

translation.en: No plan survives contact with the enemy completely intact.
translation.it: Nessun piano supera intatto un contatto con il nemico.

translation.en: Are we enemies? You sound American.
[man] I am American.
And whether or not you and I are enemies
is completely up to you.
What's your name?
My name is Alexander Kessel.
You say that like I should know it.
And now that you do, you will never forget it.
translation.it: Ora sai il mio nome e non te lo scorderai più.

translation.en: How about I just call you "asshole"?
translation.it: Che ne dici se ti chiamo "stronzo"?

translation.en: You know, usually it takes a woman a second date to reach that conclusion.
translation.it: Di solito ho questa conversazione al secondo appuntamento.

translation.en: Nothing usual about me.
You know, I'm kind of getting that.
So, Captain, seems as though you and I are at an impasse
translation.it: Quindi, Capitano, siamo finiti in un vicolo cieco.

translation.en: because I need to disable your command center so my people in Russia can fire those missiles.
translation.it: Io devo disabilitare il Centro di Comando per far lanciare i missili ai miei.

translation.en: And you need to keep me out.
translation.it: E tu non devi farmi entrare.

translation.en: But, full disclosure,
I have contained or killed everyone else on this vessel,
translation.it: che tutti sulla base sono imprigionati o morti,

translation.en: so I will be getting into that room.
Let me in now
and I will spare your lives.
And let millions of Americans die?
translation.it: Condannando a morte milioni di americani?

translation.en: I don't think you realize why someone joins the Army.
translation.it: Forse non sai perché ci si arruola.

translation.en: You are alone in the middle of the ocean,
translation.it: Sei da sola nel mezzo dell'oceano,

translation.en: miles from any port,
way beyond the nearest shipping lane.
translation.it: e dalla rotta marittima più vicina.

translation.en: No one is going to be able to get here and save you
before I cut through these doors.
Hey, Shah, how many janitors are there?
translation.it: Ehi, Shah, quanti custodi ci sono qui?

translation.en: I don't know. Six, seven?
-Which is it, six or seven? -[Shah] I don't know. I didn't hire them.
translation.it: Sei o sette? Non lo so. Non li ho assunti io.

translation.en: This is a big rig. You couldn't have killed everyone so quickly.
translation.it: La base è grande. Non puoi aver ucciso tutti così in fretta.

translation.en: [Kessel] Nerve agent.
Released it through the A/C. Put 'em all right to sleep.
translation.it: Li ho messi a nanna tramite l'impianto di aerazione.

translation.en: [snorts] Bullshit.
If it makes any difference, they felt nothing.
translation.it: Se ti consola, non hanno sofferto.

translation.en: We did have to shoot them to be sure.
translation.it: Per sicurezza gli abbiamo anche sparato.

translation.en: [Kessel] Don't worry.
The command center has its own A/C, and try as I might…
translation.it: Il Centro di Comando è aerato indipendentemente…

translation.en: You can't access it. Would we be having this awesome little conversation if I could?
translation.it: - Non può infiltrarsi. - O non staremmo qui a parlare, no?

translation.en: -SBX-1. This is Captain Collins. -Is this real?
-General Dyson. Where's Colonel Marshall? -[man] Everyone quiet.
translation.it: - Generale Dyson. Il colonnello Marshall? - Zitti.

translation.en: He's dead, sir.
Dead? What happened?
Six to seven terrorists disguised as janitors seized our vessel.
translation.it: Sei o sette terroristi travestiti da custodi ci hanno attaccati.

translation.en: They killed Marshall, they claim they have killed the crew,
translation.it: Hanno ucciso Marshall e, dicono, l'equipaggio.

translation.en: -and tried to take the command center. -Tried?
translation.it: - Volevano il Centro di Comando. - Volevano?

translation.en: -And failed. -[Dyson] Who's there with you?
translation.it: Non l'hanno preso. Chi c'è con lei?

translation.en: Corporals Shah and Baker.
Baker's unconscious. Hit by a bullet.
translation.it: Baker è svenuto. Gli hanno sparato.

translation.en: How secure are you?
They're using blowtorches to cut through the outer door.
translation.it: Stanno tagliando la porta esterna con la fiamma ossidrica.

translation.en: Best guess…
Sixty minutes.
Make that 30 minutes.
-[Dyson] And the inner door? -Same. I don't know.
translation.it: E la porta interna? Idem. Non lo so.

translation.en: What can you tell us about these terrorists?
American. Leader says his name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.it: Sono americani. Il loro leader è Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: Get me a full background check on this guy. What else?
translation.it: Voglio sapere tutto di lui. Che altro?

translation.en: They move like they've been trained,
and they're using nerve agents.
What's happening at Greely? Shooters are dead.
translation.it: - Come va a Greely? - I terroristi sono morti.

translation.en: Unfortunately, so are the computers that control the interceptors.
translation.it: Ma lo sono anche i computer degli Interceptor.

translation.en: Burned them all with acid.
So it's just us.
Afraid so.
A SEAL team is inbound to you.
You have to hang on a little longer.
-ETA? -Ninety minutes.
Are they joking?
-No, we are not joking. -[Collins] Madam President.
The terrorists have 16 mobile missile launchers
that we and the Russians cannot find.
translation.it: ma né noi né i russi sappiamo dove.

translation.en: Only reason they haven't launched them yet
is because you still have control of your interceptors.
translation.it: solo perché controllate ancora i vostri Interceptor.

translation.en: The second you don't,
they will launch those missiles on the United States.
translation.it: lanceranno i missili sugli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: Now, we don't have time to evacuate 16 cities,
translation.it: Non c'è tempo di far evacuare 16 città,

translation.en: so we're counting on you to keep those maniacs out of that room.
translation.it: contiamo su di voi, tenete quei pazzi fuori da quella stanza.

translation.en: Understood, Madam President.
We'll get back to you soon. Keep us updated.
Yes, sir.
Captain, hold that room.
[soldier] Let's move out! Go!
[operator] SEAL team, you are clear for immediate departure to SBX-1.
translation.it: Squadra SEAL, potete partire subito per la SBX-1.

translation.en: Ninety minutes? There's no way we can last that long.
translation.it: Novanta minuti? Non resisteremo così tanto.

translation.en: Not without a fight.
What? No. No, no.
I'm not a fighter. I'm a signal specialist.
translation.it: Sono un esperto di comunicazioni, non un soldato.

translation.en: I sit at a desk and stare at a screen, and know what? I like it.
translation.it: Sto sempre seduto davanti al computer e mi piace.

translation.en: Know why? Because nothing ever happens.
I mean, I haven't fired a gun since basic.
Don't worry. Guns still work the same.
Look, you can't count on me. You can't.
translation.it: Non conti su di me. Davvero.

translation.en: You surrender?
Do you?
Still quite enjoying fucking up your day.
translation.it: Mi sto divertendo a mandarti a puttane i piani.

translation.en: Do you know anything about the fall of Rome?
translation.it: Cosa sai della caduta di Roma?

translation.en: When the barbarians massed outside the city gates
translation.it: I barbari, alle porte della città,

translation.en: they did unspeakable things to try and force the Romans to let them in.
translation.it: fecero cose indicibili per provare a entrare.

translation.en: Exitus actum probat. "The result justifies the deed."
translation.it: Exitus actum probat. "Il fine giustifica i mezzi."

translation.en: You remember Captain Welsh?
He's a father of four and a grandfather of seven.
translation.it: Ha quattro figli e sette nipoti.

translation.en: [Collins] This is not gonna work.
Open the doors.
You can't let him die.
I will not open these doors.
If you don't, I will kill him.
I will not open these doors.
Last chance.
Kill anyone you want.
I will never open this door.
We're going to die too, aren't we?
We are not gonna die.
They're gonna get in here. They're gonna kill us.
-Corporal. -There's nothing we can do to stop them!
Corporal Shah, they're not in here yet,
translation.it: Caporale Shah, non sono ancora entrati qui,

translation.en: but if we're going to keep them out, I need you thinking clearly.
translation.it: ma per continuare a tenerli fuori, deve essere lucido.

translation.en: We still have a job to do, right?
translation.it: Abbiamo un lavoro da fare, no?

translation.en: Right.
So go back to your post and keep our scanners on Tavlinka.
translation.it: Torni alla postazione e punti gli scanner su Tavlinka.

translation.en: And if they launch? We intercept.
translation.it: - E se lanciano i missili? - Li intercettiamo.

translation.en: We also need to figure out every way they can penetrate this room.
translation.it: Dobbiamo anche scoprire tutte le possibili entrate.

translation.en: Tunnel's the only direct way, in or out.
translation.it: Il tunnel è l'unica via d'accesso diretta.

translation.en: What about indirect? Any new piping or conduits I should know about?
translation.it: E quelle indirette? Nuove tubature o condotti di cui non so?

translation.en: Plumbing comes through a conduit in the floor too small for anyone to fit through.
translation.it: Il condotto delle tubature nel pavimento è troppo stretto.

translation.en: Same for the cables.
What else could they do? Think.
What about blowing the radar dome?
Dome's reinforced even stronger than we are.
translation.it: È più rinforzato di questa stanza.

translation.en: Same with the interceptors.
Get me eyes outside the hatches, top and bottom.
translation.it: Voglio vedere fuori dai portelli, sopra e sotto.

translation.en: Get the shotgun.
Shoot him!
Shoot him now!
Looks like it was just the one.
When was the last time this thing was test fired?
translation.it: Quando è stato testato l'ultima volta?

translation.en: I don't know. Can it still work?
Not without blowing up in your face.
-What about your pistol? -Out.
translation.it: - E la sua pistola? - È lì fuori.

translation.en: [sighs] So we have no weapons.
Help me.
[Shah] Thanks for saving Turbo.
[Collins] Who?
Turbo, the turtle. My kids gave him to me.
translation.it: Turbo, la tartaruga. È un regalo dei miei figli.

translation.en: How many kids you got?
Prisha, she's nine. Aditi, seven. And Kalyan, he's three.
translation.it: Prisha ha nove anni, Aditi sette e Kalyan tre.

translation.en: I haven't seen them for six months.
translation.it: Non li vedo da sei mesi.

translation.en: Best thing you can do for them now is help me stop those missiles.
translation.it: La cosa migliore che può fare per loro è aiutarmi a fermare quei missili.

translation.en: Anything?
[Shah] They got everyone.
He's just going to keep buzzing till you answer.
translation.it: Continuerà a suonare finché non risponde.

translation.en: [Shah] What do you want now?
Captain, you should see this.
Think you're the first one to throw that in my face?
translation.it: Pensi di essere il primo a mostrarmelo?

translation.en: Think you're gonna break me?
And yes.
-[Collins] It's gonna take more than that. -I've got more coming.
translation.it: Ci vorrà molto di più. - È ciò che ho in serbo. - Non è vero. Non sai che fare.

translation.en: No, you don't. You're scrambling.
translation.it: - È ciò che ho in serbo. - Non è vero. Non sai che fare.

translation.en: -[Kessel] Am I? -Desperately.
How so?
You're a planner.
Six years, you said.
Looking for ways to beat the security, getting your people aboard,
translation.it: Hai passato i controlli di sicurezza, hai fatto arrivare qui i tuoi,

translation.en: you must have gone over and over these things
until you were absolutely sure you planned for every possible outcome,
translation.it: fino a essere certo di aver previsto ogni possibile risultato,

translation.en: but you couldn't plan for me.
You know how I know?
Because I'm meant to be in Fort Hunter right now on my new post.
translation.it: Perché oggi dovevo iniziare il nuovo mandato a Fort Hunter.

translation.en: Only fell through late last night when they reassigned me here.
translation.it: Ma mi hanno riassegnata qui ieri notte ed è saltato tutto.

translation.en: And now…
Now you can't beat me.
I'll give you "unexpected."
But not unbeatable.
See, here's what I know.
I know that three years ago, you scored your dream job.
translation.it: Tre anni fa avevi ottenuto il lavoro dei tuoi sogni.

translation.en: Pentagon, three-star General.
translation.it: Al Pentagono, con un generale a tre stelle.

translation.en: A battlefield hero, his troops loved him.
translation.it: Un eroe di guerra, amato dalle truppe.

translation.en: They were going to build a statue to the guy.
And he promised to take you all the way to the top,
translation.it: E aveva promesso di portarti ai vertici con lui,

translation.en: but then you learned the price you'd have to pay.
translation.it: ma poi capisti il prezzo da pagare.

translation.en: I know the Army review board just decided you made it all up.
translation.it: La commissione di disciplina decise che ti eri inventata tutto.

translation.en: Threw you right back into the lion's den.
translation.it: E ti ributtò nella fossa dei leoni.

translation.en: I know that three-star welcomed you with open arms.
translation.it: Il generale ti riaccolse a braccia aperte.

translation.en: Because predators always want to show you exactly who's in charge.
translation.it: Perché i maniaci vogliono sempre far capire chi comanda.

translation.en: Wait, that general got discharged.
Which means you beat him. You won.
She won the battle, not the war.
translation.it: Ha vinto la battaglia, non la guerra.

translation.en: See, first came the hate mail.
The bounty hunt for these lewd photos…
translation.it: PUTTANA HAI TRADITO IL CODICE Poi la caccia alle foto osé.

translation.en: …then the death threats.
[Kessel] All from within the army that you so proudly served.
translation.it: Tutto proveniente da dentro l'esercito che tu servi con onore.

translation.en: Then finally…
that night.
[man] JJ! JJ!
JJ, come on!
Come on, wake up. JJ!
Come on. Wake up. Come back.
Papa?
It's okay, it's okay. Papa's here. It's okay. I got you.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Il tuo papà è qui. Ci sono io.

translation.en: Papa… sorry.
You are beatable, Captain.
It's been proven.
If you are so right,
then what am I doing here?
Why do I still wear the uniform?
War's not over yet, motherfucker.
translation.it: La guerra non è finita, stronzo.

translation.en: You should be working with me.
In fact, I will give you 30 million dollars if you open these doors.
translation.it: Anzi, ti do 30 milioni di dollari, se apri la porta.

translation.en: I will have you flown to the country of your choosing
translation.it: Ti farò arrivare nel Paese che vuoi,

translation.en: where you can live the rest of your life in luxury.
translation.it: dove vivrai il resto della tua vita nel lusso.

translation.en: If anyone has earned the right to walk away from this, it's you.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che ha il diritto di tirare i remi in barca, sei tu.

translation.en: Thirty million dollars.
What did the Army ever give you?
Your depressing old job in the middle of nowhere, where they can forget about you?
translation.it: Un lavoro deprimente in mezzo al nulla per dimenticarsi di te?

translation.en: They don't care about you.
translation.it: A loro non importa di te.

translation.en: Open these doors.
Take back your power.
That's how you win a war.
[pilot] SEAL team is inbound to SBX-1. ETA 67 minutes.
translation.it: Squadra SEAL in arrivo alla SBX-1. Tempo stimato: 67 minuti.

translation.en: [Collins] They're in.
Open the door and you leave here a wealthy woman.
translation.it: Apri la porta e diventerai ricca.

translation.en: We still have time before you cut through this door.
translation.it: Abbiamo tempo prima che tagli questa porta.

translation.en: -You really don't. -[gun cocks]
-[Collins] Beaver. -[Shah] What?
[Collins] Nice, Beaver.
Initiating satellite relay and EBS hack.
translation.it: Avvio del collegamento satellitare e dell'EBS.

translation.en: We're in.
No, I have a new one.
And tell Danny to move in.
translation.it: E di' a Danny di avvicinarsi.

translation.en: Are you hurt?
I've had worse.
It really didn't have to be this way.
translation.it: Non doveva andare per forza così.

translation.en: If Corporal Baker doesn't get hit, we avoid all of this.
translation.it: Se non avessero sparato a Baker, avremmo evitato tutto questo.

translation.en: If you're gonna kill me, just kill me.
translation.it: Se vuoi uccidermi, fallo e basta.

translation.en: No mansplaining.
I gave you choices.
It was your decision to become enemies.
translation.it: Hai deciso tu di essermi nemica.

translation.en: You were with them this whole time?
Yeah.
[Shah grunts] Traitor.
America's the traitor.
[Collins] Always were full of shit, Beaver.
[Beaver] Ah, what do you know?
I love my country.
Hell, there was a time I would have even died for it. [sniffs]
translation.it: In un certo periodo sarei anche morto per la patria.

translation.en: Never too late.
Shut up.
It's because of immigrants like you
translation.it: È colpa di immigrati come te

translation.en: and like you
that I lost my job
and the government took away my rights,
translation.it: che il governo mi ha tolto i diritti

translation.en: started making up all kinds of shit to scare me.
translation.it: e ha provato a spaventarmi in ogni modo.

translation.en: [Beaver] Shit.
I don't even recognize America these days.
translation.it: Ormai non la riconosco più, l'America.

translation.en: And that gives you the right to murder millions of people?
translation.it: Questo ti dà il diritto di uccidere milioni di persone?

translation.en: Well, it gives me the right to start looking out for myself.
translation.it: Beh, mi dà il diritto di pensare a me stesso.

translation.en: And now I got ten million ways to do that.
translation.it: E ora ho 10 milioni di modi per farlo.

translation.en: Money? That's what this is about?
[Beaver] Uh, yeah. It's what America's about.
translation.it: Sì. In America è sempre questione di soldi.

translation.en: And if you don't get that,
translation.it: E se ancora non l'hai capito,

translation.en: you obviously haven't been paying attention, Shah.
translation.it: non hai fatto molta attenzione, Shah.

translation.en: Wake up, man.
Yeah, sure. Sure. Blame America. Blame the government.
translation.it: Sì, certo. Dai pure la colpa all'America. Al governo.

translation.en: Blame everyone else but you.
translation.it: A chiunque tranne che a te stesso.

translation.en: That's what all losers do.
You just keep on talking, darlin'.
Because before this is all over,
I'm gonna do to you
what every enlisted grunt secretly wants to do
translation.it: tutto ciò che ogni soldatino muore dalla voglia di fare

translation.en: to every female officer.
The only way you can get it, isn't it?
translation.it: È il tuo unico modo di farti una scopata?

translation.en: Hey. Another thing.
Never call a woman by anything other than her name.
translation.it: Le donne vanno chiamate per nome.

translation.en: Not honey, or honey pie, or sugar, or sugar pie,
or sweetie, or sweetie pie.
Not baby, sweetheart, ho, bitch,
and above all, most of all, beyond all else,
translation.it: e, soprattutto, la cosa che non devi mai fare

translation.en: don't ever, ever, call her "darlin'."
Satellite relay's live on the EBS. The Emergency Broadcast System?
translation.it: - Siamo connessi all'EBS. - Il Sistema di trasmissione d'emergenza?

translation.en: Yeah, so that every camera on this rig
translation.it: Sì, così le telecamere della piattaforma

translation.en: can be broadcast to any device that has smart capabilities.
Wouldn't want anyone missing the show.
Mr. Kessel. Where's Captain Collins?
translation.it: Signor Kessel. Dov'è il capitano Collins?

translation.en: She's here. She's unharmed.
Well… relatively.
As is Corporal Shah.
[Dyson] And Corporal Baker?
Howdy, General.
[Dyson] You two are servicemen. You took an oath. How could you betray your country?
translation.it: Siete soldati. Avete fatto un giuramento. Come avete potuto tradire il Paese?

translation.en: I swore an oath to the old America. Not this one.
translation.it: Ho giurato fedeltà alla vecchia America, non questa.

translation.en: [Dyson] What do you want?
[Kessel] From you?
I'm just waiting for America to join our little chat here.
translation.it: Sto aspettando che l'America si colleghi.

translation.en: Dad's proud. That must be nice.
translation.it: Il tuo papà è orgoglioso. Che dolce.

translation.en: EBS has slaved all signals.
translation.it: L'EBS ha il controllo di tutti i segnali.

translation.en: Say hello to America, boss.
So you know it's got a big screen, great picture quality, you know,
translation.it: Lo schermo è enorme e la qualità dell'immagine è ottima.

translation.en: the sound's kind of meh, but I don't really listen to the TV that much.
translation.it: Il suono non è granché, ma io non ascolto mai la TV.

translation.en: I play music when I watch and stuff so it doesn't really…
translation.it: Quando la guardo, ascolto la musica, quindi…

translation.en: Why'd it go black and white?
translation.it: Perché è in bianco e nero?

translation.en: Where's the President?
I'm here.
If you launch even one of those missiles,
translation.it: Se lanciate anche solo un missile,

translation.en: I swear before God that we will hunt you down
translation.it: giuro su Dio che vi darò la caccia

translation.en: and wipe you from existence.
That's enough. You're boring me.
I'm taking your bully pulpit now.
My fellow Americans, I am Alexander Kessel,
translation.it: Miei concittadini americani, sono Alexander Kessel,

translation.en: son of trust fund billionaire, Alexander Kessel Senior,
translation.it: figlio del magnate dei fondi fiduciari Alexander Kessel Senior,

translation.en: who you may also know
is the current utterly unqualified US ambassador to the United Nations.
translation.it: è l'attuale nonché totalmente incompetente ambasciatore americano alle Nazioni Unite.

translation.en: Now, my associates in Russia control 16 nuclear missiles,
translation.it: I miei colleghi in Russia hanno il controllo di 16 missili nucleari

translation.en: and I control the only interceptor missiles
translation.it: e io controllo gli unici missili Interceptor

translation.en: that are capable of stopping them.
Sixteen American cities have been targeted.
300 million of you will die.
One city will be destroyed first
so that the rest of you can watch in horror.
translation.it: così gli altri potranno assistere all'orrore.

translation.en: Missile team one…
fire.
[computer voice] Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected.
Intercept launch expires in 12 minutes.
[Kessel] Now in 12 minutes, that missile I just launched,
translation.it: Tra 12 minuti, il missile che ho appena lanciato

translation.en: will pass over my head,
at which point, it will be too late for this interceptor to catch it.
translation.it: e a quel punto sarà troppo tardi per abbatterlo con un Interceptor.

translation.en: But which city has been chosen?
translation.it: Ma quale città è la prescelta?

translation.en: Is it yours?
Wherever it lands, there's no time to run.
translation.it: Ovunque cada, non c'è tempo per scappare.

translation.en: You can't flee.
If you guessed Los Angeles,
congratulations.
The City of Angels has 23 minutes left to live.
translation.it: Alla Città degli angeli restano 23 minuti di vita.

translation.en: Wait a second.
Once Los Angeles is gone,
And the fear of every American is at its peak…
translation.it: Ragazzi, dove… Aspettate. Non stiamo chiudendo.

translation.en: We're not closing yet.
…I will launch a second wave of 15 nuclear missiles.
And of course, Washington DC.
Today…
America dies in a paroxysm of fear.
translation.it: l'America muore in preda al terrore.

translation.en: America is the greatest lie ever told.
translation.it: L'America è la più grande bugia mai detta.

translation.en: American exceptionalism? Maybe once.
When the founders got rid of kings.
translation.it: Quando i padri fondatori cacciarono i re.

translation.en: When they declared that all men are created equal.
translation.it: Quando dissero che siamo tutti uguali.

translation.en: Now they say ours are United States, but when was that true?
translation.it: Ci chiamiamo Stati Uniti, ma quando mai lo siamo stati?

translation.en: Was it true during the Civil War?
Or Jim Crow?
Hell, is it true now?
You know, this national lie, it's a festering wound,
translation.it: Questa menzogna nazionale è una ferita infetta

translation.en: and it's fatal.
There's no Band-Aid to patch it.
No, the only way to save our nation and the promise it once held
translation.it: No, l'unico modo per salvare il Paese e la promessa di un tempo

translation.en: is to erase it. Start over.
translation.it: è fare tabula rasa e ricominciare da zero.

translation.en: So maybe then. when we are staring at each other
translation.it: E forse allora, quando ci guarderemo negli occhi,

translation.en: from across the rubble,
we will all agree that this time
translation.it: decideremo di comune accordo che questa volta

translation.en: we're going to get America right.
This is Corporal Rahul Shah.
translation.it: Questo è il caporale Rahul Shah.

translation.en: Do you like being an American, Rahul?
With all my heart.
But you're a Hindu. You can be both.
translation.it: - Ma sei indù. - Si può essere entrambi.

translation.en: You've never been mocked for your faith?
translation.it: Hanno mai deriso la tua fede?

translation.en: Never been the subject to enhanced screenings at airports?
translation.it: Non ti hanno mai fermato per dei controlli aggiuntivi in aeroporto?

translation.en: Share with the world what you've seen.
translation.it: Di' a tutti ciò che hai visto.

translation.en: I've seen you in the showers,
translation.it: Ti ho visto sotto la doccia

translation.en: and I can see why you're obsessed with missiles.
translation.it: e capisco la tua ossessione per i missili.

translation.en: Pathetic.
I got this, boss. [inhaling]
This is Captain Joanna Julia Collins.
translation.it: Ecco il capitano Joanna Julia Collins.

translation.en: JJ to her friends.
A soldier who has fought with honor and courage here today.
translation.it: Un soldato che oggi ha lottato con onore e coraggio.

translation.en: Now, three years ago, one of our nation's top generals
translation.it: Tre anni fa uno dei generali più importanti della nazione

translation.en: tried to abuse his position of power and force her to have sex with him.
translation.it: ha provato a sfruttare il suo potere per costringerla a fare sesso con lui.

translation.en: Whose career was ruined?
translation.it: A chi hanno rovinato la carriera?

translation.en: You should be showering her with praise,
translation.it: Dovreste tessere le sue lodi a destra e a manca,

translation.en: but she's a woman,
so instead her fellow service members
put out a bounty hunt on photos like this.
translation.it: hanno organizzato una caccia a foto come questa.

translation.en: You're an asshole, dude.
I offered her 30 million dollars to give up her post today.
translation.it: Le ho offerto 30 milioni di dollari per abbandonare la nave.

translation.en: She refused.
She took that photo for charity, by the way.
translation.it: E comunque quella foto era per beneficenza.

translation.en: What position were you? Were you goalkeeper?
Goalkeeper. It's a tough position.
Beg your pardon?
You take a lot of hits, concussions, bruised ribs,
translation.it: Ci si fa male spesso: concussioni, costole incrinate,

translation.en: but the most common injury is dislocated thumbs.
translation.it: ma l'infortunio più diffuso è il pollice slogato.

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Beaver] Oh shit.
[Kessel] No! Shit! [panting]
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in six minutes.
Think you can make it?
Do you?
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
You have five minutes. Hold her or kill her.
translation.it: Hai cinque minuti. Tienila ferma o uccidila.

translation.en: [computer voice] Interceptor launched.
[computer voice] Missile intercepted.
Fucking die already, would you?
Remember? I said, "Whatever happens, make sure you shoot her first." [sniffs]
translation.it: Ti ricordi? Avevo detto: "Qualunque cosa accada, spara prima a lei.

translation.en: "You just take her out of the fight, because if you don't do that,
if you don't just put her down right away, man, she's gonna be trouble."
translation.it: se non lo fai, ci darà dei problemi".

translation.en: She's… She's just one of those women, you know?
translation.it: È… quel tipo di donna, hai capito?

translation.en: She just likes to just get under your skin and just needle you, man.
translation.it: Le piace dar fastidio agli altri e punzecchiarli.

translation.en: Like a… like a fucking needle.
This is a setback and nothing more.
[Beaver] Setback?
Hey, did you hear that? It's a setback. That's cool.
translation.it: Bene. Sentito? È un piccolo ostacolo. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: She shot the goddamn missile out of the sky!
translation.it: Ha abbattuto il missile mentre era in volo!

translation.en: It's one missile. There are 15 left.
translation.it: È un missile. Ne abbiamo altri 15.

translation.en: And what happens if she shoots them down too, huh?
What then? What do we do then?
Our faces, man, they're all over the world right now.
translation.it: Tutto il mondo ci ha visti in faccia.

translation.en: What do we do then?
What's the statute of limitations on attempted nuking?
translation.it: Dopo quanto cade in prescrizione l'attacco nucleare?

translation.en: We are prepared for this. We have backup plans.
translation.it: Siamo pronti. Abbiamo vari piani B.

translation.en: Really? [sighs]
You played that one pretty close to the buzzer.
[panting] Doing my best here, ma'am.
Can you turn off the TV coverage?
Give me a minute.
Not from here.
[Dyson] Understood.
How long till the SEALS get here?
Fifty minutes. They're going as fast as they can.
translation.it: 50 minuti. Vanno più veloci che possono.

translation.en: Not fast enough.
[Dyson] And we got some background on Alexander Kessel.
translation.it: E sappiamo di più su Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: He was Army, military intelligence. Started out doing Russian work,
translation.it: Era nei Servizi segreti. Ha iniziato lavorando in Russia,

translation.en: then became a psy ops and torture specialist.
translation.it: è esperto di guerra psicologica e tortura.

translation.en: [Collins] Torture?
[Dyson] He was good. Too good sometimes.
Killed two prisoners while he was torturing them.
translation.it: Ha ucciso due prigionieri mentre li torturava.

translation.en: [Collins] Jesus. I'm dealing with a genuine psychopath.
translation.it: Cristo. Ho di fronte uno psicopatico.

translation.en: You're not alone. Lot of smart people here trying to figure out a way to help you.
translation.it: Non è sola. Degli esperti stanno cercando un modo di aiutarla.

translation.en: Tacticians, game theorists.
Fuck theory. I need some fucking soldiers with guns.
translation.it: Fanculo la teoria. Mi servono dei soldati armati.

translation.en: I hear you, Captain.
Come on, give her some guns, man.
If you don't mind me saying, you are one armor-plated woman.
translation.it: Se posso, lei ha la pellaccia dura.

translation.en: Army never should have picked a fight with you.
translation.it: L'Esercito non doveva mettersi contro di lei.

translation.en: Got that right.
What'd I miss?
Not much.
Did we stop the missile?
Yeah. We stopped it.
Nice.
Wait. Where's all the bad guys?
translation.it: Aspetti. Dove sono andati i cattivi?

translation.en: That Alexander dude must be pissed at you.
translation.it: Quell'Alexander sarà incazzato marcio con lei.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's because I'm still fucking up his day.
translation.it: Sì, beh, gli sto mandando a puttane i piani.

translation.en: [Collins] Papa?
Hey. How you feeling?
You up for some soup?
Sure.
You saw what they did. [Papa] I'll take care of it.
translation.it: - Hai visto cos'hanno fatto. - Ci penso io.

translation.en: Do not let them get to you now. Don't let them win.
translation.it: Non farti condizionare. Non dargliela vinta.

translation.en: They hate me.
You told the truth.
Nobody cares about the truth.
[Papa] I care.
I've lost everything. Everything I ever worked for.
translation.it: Ho perso tutto. Tutto ciò per cui avevo lavorato.

translation.en: Hey, hey.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.it: Cosa ti ho insegnato fin da quando eri piccola?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
translation.it: Qual è l'unica regola nella vita?

translation.en: Never stop fighting.
[Papa] You got fight in you, kid.
Always have. Just like your mama.
translation.it: Lo sei sempre stata. Proprio come tua madre.

translation.en: [Shah] Captain?
He wants to talk.
How long have I been out?
[Shah] Not long. Fifteen minutes or so.
[Collins] What now, asshole?
You think I'm a monster.
translation.it: Pensi che io sia un mostro.

translation.en: I was.
You know, growing up, I never summered where I wintered. [chuckles]
translation.it: Da piccolo non trascorrevo mai l'estate dove passavo l'inverno.

translation.en: I was either on a yacht in the Hamptons or skiing in Val d'Isère.
translation.it: Ero o su uno yacht negli Hamptons o sulle piste da sci nella Val d'Isère.

translation.en: Sucks to be you, dude.
I'm not complaining.
I was the product of a failed society.
translation.it: Ero il prodotto di una società fallita.

translation.en: A society that consistently rewards money and ignores everything else.
translation.it: Una società in cui contano sempre e solo i soldi, nient'altro.

translation.en: What? You think my father became ambassador to the UN
translation.it: Secondo te, mio padre è ambasciatore all'ONU

translation.en: because of any worthwhile diplomatic skills
translation.it: per le sue spiccate doti diplomatiche

translation.en: or because of his political donations?
translation.it: o per le sue donazioni ai politici?

translation.en: See, that's what we do in America.
We just figure because someone's rich that means they're smart.
translation.it: Crediamo che chiunque sia ricco sia anche intelligente.

translation.en: My father's a moron.
He inherited his money. -He didn't earn it. -God. Don't tell me this is about daddy issues.
translation.it: - I soldi li ha ereditati, non guadagnati. - Non dirmi che è per via di tuo padre.

translation.en: I wouldn't expect you to understand.
translation.it: Non mi aspetto che tu capisca.

translation.en: I understand plenty.
Your father is a good man.
The best.
He served too, didn't he?
Thirty-six years.
[Kessel] That's how he met your mom? When he was stationed in Spain?
translation.it: Ha conosciuto tua madre mentre era in Spagna?

translation.en: Does he still hang out with his army buddies?
[Collins] Every day.
In Scottsdale, right?
Yeah.
[Kessel] The Patriot's Valley Veterans Retirement Home.
translation.it: Patriot's Valley, casa di riposo per veterani.

translation.en: Room 6B.
Papa?
Let him go!
-He's got nothing to do with this! -Beg to differ.
Let him go!
You said I could kill whoever, and you'd never open this door.
translation.it: L'hai detto tu: "Uccidi chi vuoi, non ti aprirò".

translation.en: Let him go, God damn you!
-[Kessel] Let's see if that's still valid. -Fuck you!
translation.it: Vediamo se sei di parola. Vaffanculo!

translation.en: You think it's going to go any other way?
translation.it: Come pensi che andrà a finire?

translation.en: This is what I was trained for. Psy ops. Military intelligence.
translation.it: Mi hanno addestrato per la guerra psicologica.

translation.en: Find your enemy's weak point and exploit it.
translation.it: Per trovare il punto debole del nemico.

translation.en: [gasps] Let him go!
If you don't open the door,
I will take apart your father piece by piece.
-Fine. Have it your way. -No, no! Please. No, no, no!
-Do it. -No, no, no! No, don't! No!
-[Collins] No, no, no! -[groaning]
-You know I can't. -[Kessel] Yes, you can.
translation.it: Sai che non posso. Sì che puoi.

translation.en: -No, I can't. -You can make this stop whenever you want.
Let me speak with him. Let me speak with him. Okay?
-Let me speak with him! -Captain, no.
Let her speak.
[Collins] Papa?
-JJ. -I can't…
I can't… I can't lose you.
Listen to me. Are you listening?
Never stop fighting!
-Kill him. -No! No!
-No, please God. God! -[gunshot]
No! [sobs] No, no!
My daddy would have made me open that door.
translation.it: Mio padre mi avrebbe fatto aprire la porta.

translation.en: No question!
[Shah] How did they know?
How did they know to have people in Scottsdale?
translation.it: Come facevano ad avere qualcuno a Scottsdale?

translation.en: The Army signed your transfer order last night, right?
translation.it: Le hanno firmato l'ordine di trasferimento ieri sera?

translation.en: [panting] Right.
Which means they couldn't have known until a few hours ago.
translation.it: Quindi l'hanno saputo solo poche ore fa.

translation.en: [Kessel] You still don't get it? You're a pariah in your own ranks.
translation.it: Non ci arrivi? Sei un'emarginata tra i tuoi.

translation.en: The decision to have you transferred to this godforsaken rig
translation.it: Hanno deciso di trasferirti sulla piattaforma

translation.en: was made three days ago. They only told you last night.
translation.it: tre giorni fa. A te l'hanno detto ieri.

translation.en: I've known for 72 hours.
-[sharp inhale] What are you doing? -Activating my insurance policy.
translation.it: Cosa fai? Attivo la mia polizza assicurativa.

translation.en: If she's committed enough to watch her father die,
translation.it: Lei è determinata, ha sacrificato suo padre,

translation.en: you will find that I am equally as committed.
That's the HVAR code. The emergency sinking protocol.
You're going to sink this whole rig?
Our telemetry's saying SBX-1's asset removal protocol just activated.
translation.it: Ci risulta che è stato attivato il protocollo di rimozione risorse.

translation.en: Don't tell me he--
He's going to sink us. [gasps]
He's going to sink us using our own scuttling protocol.
translation.it: Ci farà affondare usando il nostro stesso protocollo.

translation.en: [computer voice] High value asset removal protocol activated.
What do we do?
As long as we are above the surface, we can still fire our missiles.
translation.it: Finché stiamo a galla, possiamo lanciare i missili.

translation.en: [computer voice] Thirteen minutes until total vessel submersion.
translation.it: Tredici minuti all'immersione totale della base.

translation.en: We've got 13 minutes to figure out a solution.
translation.it: Abbiamo 13 minuti per trovare una soluzione.

translation.en: I'm going down there.
[Shah] Down where? Into the hulls?
Yes. To close the valves one by one.
translation.it: Sì. A chiudere le valvole una a una.

translation.en: You can't go down there with wounds like that.
translation.it: Non può andare con quelle ferite.

translation.en: I'll manage.
I'll… I'll go.
I'll do it.
[Dyson] You're running out of time. We clock it at 13 minutes.
translation.it: Veloci. Ci risulta che manchino 13 minuti.

translation.en: So do we.
What's the ETA on the SEAL team?
Twenty-five.
[sighs] Damn. I'll call you back.
All right.
Don't think this is what heroes look like.
translation.it: Gli eroi non si conciano così.

translation.en: That's exactly what they look like.
Whatever you say, Captain.
You can do this.
[Shah] You got this, Rahul.
You got this.
See you on the other side.
Little bastard grew some balls.
translation.it: Allo stronzo sono cresciute le palle.

translation.en: Take care of it.
This is mine.
HVAR's been activated. Twelve and a half minutes.
Well, how far away is he?
[pilot] Twenty-two minutes out. Ready your weapons.
Okay, I've reached the hull.
You see the console?
This is gonna take a while.
-[Collins] You just have to slow it down. -[Shah] Copy that.
How are we looking, Captain?
[computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
-12 minutes 11 seconds until… -[Collins] You just bought us two minutes.
translation.it: - 12 minuti e 11 secondi… - Funziona. Hai guadagnato due minuti.

translation.en: Keep going.
Hell, yeah. I'm an ass-kicking, valve-closing machine.
translation.it: Evvai! Sono una macchina chiudi-valvole e spacca-culi.

translation.en: Nobody plugs leaks like me.
translation.it: Nessuno tappa le perdite come me.

translation.en: -Oh. Shit. -What?
I got company.
Get out of there. You hear me?
translation.it: Vattene da lì. Mi hai sentito?

translation.en: [Shah] It's too late.
It's not too late. Get out of there, now.
translation.it: Non è troppo tardi. Vattene, ora.

translation.en: I'm sorry I couldn't help you more before, Captain, but I'm hoping this helps you now.
translation.it: Scusi se non l'ho aiutata prima, Capitano, ma spero di rifarmi ora.

translation.en: [computer voice] Recalculating. Recalculating.
Tell my children I love them.
translation.it: Dica ai miei figli che gli voglio bene.

translation.en: Howdy.
You don't have to do this, Beaver.
You're not a murderer.
You're right.
I'm not a murderer.
I'm a fucking patriot.
Rahul? Rahul?
[Beaver] Shah can't come to the phone right now.
translation.it: Shah non può venire al telefono.

translation.en: It's just you and the three of us.
translation.it: Sei rimasta sola contro noi tre.

translation.en: You're dead.
It was a valiant attempt.
I admire his courage, truly.
To be honest, I'd written him off.
translation.it: Sarò onesto, non gli avrei dato un soldo.

translation.en: His psych evaluation said he'd fold under pressure.
I didn't even bother to put people on his family.
translation.it: Non avevo nessuno dalla sua famiglia.

translation.en: Turns out, he almost derailed me.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu, Sierra, Bravo, 1-9-9-6.
Tell Danny to move in.
Cut the feed.
That means nothing.
Then you won't mind if I show it to the world.
translation.it: Allora posso mostrarlo al mondo intero.

translation.en: Fine.
What the hell just happened?
That's a Swiss bank account.
translation.it: È un conto in banca svizzero.

translation.en: I should have known. [inhales]
You're not a nuclear terrorist or a fanatic. You've been paid for this.
translation.it: Non sei un terrorista nucleare o un fanatico. Ti pagano.

translation.en: Hey, this is my operation. I'm the one in charge.
translation.it: L'operazione è la mia, sono io al comando.

translation.en: So what if I'm getting paid? Huh? Am I wrong?
translation.it: E anche se mi facessi pagare? Faccio male?

translation.en: I'm destroying a system that tried to destroy you.
translation.it: Distruggerò il sistema che voleva annientarti.

translation.en: I'm making sure what happened to you doesn't happen to other women.
translation.it: Così nessun'altra donna subirà ciò che hai passato tu.

translation.en: How much?
What are you doing?
Who's paying you?
Seriously, stop with the tape.
What about the Russian sub?
Stop taping the window?
The Danilov, huh? Yeah, how's Danny?
translation.it: Il Danilov? Sì. Come sta Danny?

translation.en: Can you please…
Please stop taping the window. For me?
translation.it: Puoi smettere di coprire il pannello?

translation.en: You paid off a sub captain. Where is he taking you?
translation.it: Hai corrotto il capitano del sottomarino. Dove ti porterà?

translation.en: Stop taping the window.
Someplace you can get a new name, a new face?
translation.it: In un posto dove ti comprerai un nome e un volto nuovi?

translation.en: Somewhere you can spend your blood money?
translation.it: Dove potrai spendere i tuoi soldi insanguinati?

translation.en: Stop with the damn tape, JJ.
translation.it: Basta con il nastro adesivo, JJ.

translation.en: What about all that shit about your father?
translation.it: E le stronzate su tuo padre?

translation.en: Oh, fuck him. He ruined my family's name!
translation.it: Che si fotta. Ha rovinato il nome della mia famiglia.

translation.en: Today I restore it with dignity and respect.
translation.it: Io gli restituirò dignità e rispetto.

translation.en: [Collins] Bullshit. I saw your file.
You're just a total fucking psycho.
-Thank you. -[Kessel] For what?
-[Collins] For showing me your weakness. -Oh, yeah. What's that?
translation.it: - Mi hai mostrato il tuo punto debole. - Sì? Cioè?

translation.en: [Collins] You want to get out of here alive.
[Kessel] You know what else I want? I want to hurt you, JJ.
translation.it: Sai cos'altro voglio? Voglio farti del male, JJ,

translation.en: I want to cut off your fingers. I want you to beg me to kill you!
translation.it: voglio tagliarti le dita. Voglio che mi implori di ucciderti.

translation.en: Good job cutting the live feed. SEALS are 17 minutes out.
translation.it: Brava, ha interrotto la trasmissione. I SEAL arrivano tra 17 minuti.

translation.en: Well, that's not fast enough.
This rig is going to sink in 15 minutes.
And the second it goes under, these assholes will launch all their nukes.
translation.it: E quando accadrà, questi stronzi lanceranno i missili.

translation.en: Is there anything you can do?
I sort of have this plan.
-But it's a little counterintuitive. -[President] Let's hear it, Captain.
translation.it: È un po' controintuitivo. Sentiamo, Capitano.

translation.en: I let them take the command center. What? That's precisely what we don't want to happen.
translation.it: - Consegno loro il Centro di Comando. - Cosa? È ciò che vogliamo evitare.

translation.en: This rig is going down, and when it sinks, they win.
translation.it: La piattaforma sta affondando e quando accadrà, vinceranno.

translation.en: We have to force them to fire the missiles before that happens.
translation.it: Dobbiamo costringerli a lanciare i missili prima.

translation.en: And then what?
And then I retake the command center
translation.it: E poi mi riprendo il Centro di Comando

translation.en: and intercept their nukes.
[Dyson] Inside 12 minutes?
Yes, sir.
[Dyson] Hold on.
Fuck.
Our game theory specialist is not convinced.
translation.it: Il teorico dei giochi non è convinto.

translation.en: He's uh… concerned about your motivations.
By my calculations,
your proposed plan has a 14% chance of success.
translation.it: il suo piano ha una probabilità di successo del 14%.

translation.en: To give up that command center to a superior force with no certainty of regaining it
translation.it: Consegnare il Centro a un nemico superiore senza la certezza di riprenderlo

translation.en: is what we refer to as a negative outcome inducing event.
translation.it: è ciò che chiamiamo un evento con risultato negativo.

translation.en: Are you serious with this shit?
Are you willing to gamble every life in America on your ability to retake the center?
translation.it: Rischierebbe l'America puntando sulle sue capacità?

translation.en: I am.
I'm sorry. I cannot endorse such a move.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, non posso dare la mia approvazione.

translation.en: Listen, genius. You're saying my plan is running at 14%?
translation.it: Senti, genio. Il mio piano ha il 14% di probabilità di successo.

translation.en: Yours is zero!
You haven't been beat up, strangled, or shot defending this rig today.
translation.it: Non ti hanno picchiato, strangolato o sparato mentre difendevi la base.

translation.en: So I think you'll find I'm kind of fucking motivated here.
translation.it: Quindi direi che la mia motivazione è alle stelle, cazzo!

translation.en: We hear you, Captain.
I can do this, sir. I know I can.
Half the people here think you're crazy. The other half think you're a rock star.
translation.it: Metà della gente qui la ritiene pazza. L'altra metà la adora.

translation.en: Fortunately, I'm one of the latter.
translation.it: Per fortuna, io sono tra questi ultimi.

translation.en: Do what you have to do, Captain.
translation.it: Faccia ciò che deve fare, Capitano.

translation.en: [Collins] Still there?
-What do you think? -[Collins] I think you're getting nervous.
translation.it: Secondo te? Secondo me ti stai agitando. Se fallisci, i tuoi soci ti ammazzano.

translation.en: If you fail here, your partners will kill you.
translation.it: Secondo me ti stai agitando. Se fallisci, i tuoi soci ti ammazzano.

translation.en: You want this room? Come and get it.
translation.it: Vuoi il Centro? Vieni a prendertelo.

translation.en: [whispers] Intercom off.
Give me the radio.
Beaver, what's your ETA? [Beaver] About 30 seconds.
translation.it: - Beaver, tra quanto arrivi? - Circa 30 secondi.

translation.en: She's taped up the window. I can't see in the room.
translation.it: Ha oscurato il vetro, non vedo nella stanza.

translation.en: I need you to get in there now.
[Beaver] Relax. I'm there.
I ain't see her. She gone.
translation.it: Non la vedo. Se n'è andata.

translation.en: [Kessel] What do you mean, gone? Where is she?
Shit.
[Kessel] What?
She's on the roof.
Attention all missile teams, we have control of the interceptor.
Fire all missiles. Repeat, fire all missiles.
translation.it: Lanciate tutti i missili. Ripeto, lanciate tutti i missili.

translation.en: [computer voice] Multiple missile launch detected. Multiple missile launch detected.
[Beaver] Woo! Let's go, baby. Light 'em up!
[computer voice] Targets acquired. Targets acquired.
Chicago, Cincinnati, Atlanta, Miami, Washington DC,
Kill her.
[Beaver] She come for me.
"Come make ten million," he says.
"Buy yourself a private island," he says. "Piece of cake."
translation.it: Ti compri un'isola. È un gioco da ragazzi".

translation.en: Oh, man. [inhales]
Nope.
Give me your knife.
Do it.
Acid.
[Beaver] Where are you, darlin'?
[in singsong] Come out, come out, wherever you are.
Apologies, ladies and gentlemen, for that rude interruption,
translation.it: Scusate per l'interruzione, signore e signori,

translation.en: but as you can see,
I have retaken this command center and the nukes are on their way.
translation.it: ho ripreso il Centro di Comando e i missili sono in arrivo.

translation.en: Hey, the goalie ain't up here.
She has to be. Where else could she…
…be?
She is on the roof, Beaver.
There's no one down here.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in eight minutes.
[whispers] Ivan.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in seven minutes.
Come on.
[Beaver] Can't let you do that, darlin'.
Let me go, Beaver. You don't want this.
translation.it: Lasciami andare, Beaver. Non vuoi farlo.

translation.en: Hell, I told you what I wanted.
translation.it: Cavolo, ti ho detto cosa volevo fare.

translation.en: You're gonna die here.
No, I'm not.
I'm on the next submarine out of here. [chuckles]
translation.it: Me ne andrò col prossimo sottomarino.

translation.en: With Alexander?
He's gone. [panting]
-[Collins groans] -[Beaver] Bullshit.
I saw him go.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
[snickers] Really think a little bit of razor wire is gonna kill me?
translation.it: Credi che basti un po' di filo spinato per uccidermi?

translation.en: Gravity, darlin'.
[father] JJ… JJ, come on.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.it: Cosa ti ho insegnato fin da quando eri piccola?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
translation.it: Qual è l'unica regola nella vita?

translation.en: Never stop fighting.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in three minutes.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 60 seconds.
There she is!
There she is!
Get up. Get up!
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 40 seconds.
[panting] Don't give up. Don't give up.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 30 seconds.
[computer voice] Intercept launch expires in 20 seconds.
[computer voice] Ten seconds. Nine, eight, seven, six,
translation.it: Dieci secondi. Nove, otto, sette, sei,

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one.
[computer voice] Interceptors launched.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
[computer voice] Multiple missile interception complete.
Yeah! Woo-hoo!
Fourteen percent.
[Kessel] Look at you.
Still going, huh?
You know you really did fuck up my day.
translation.it: Mi hai davvero mandato a puttane i piani.

translation.en: But I brought America to the brink,
translation.it: Ma ho portato l'America sull'orlo del baratro

translation.en: and I'll do it again.
You may have won the battle, but not the war.
translation.it: Hai vinto una battaglia, ma non la guerra.

translation.en: [panting] Told you. War's not over yet.
translation.it: Te l'ho detto, la guerra non è finita.

translation.en: This is for my dad, asshole.
[Kessel] There's my ride.
[Kessel] There's no room for you.
[man 1, in Russian] I've arrived. I can see him.
[man 2, in Russian] You know what to do.
[man 1] What about the woman?
[man 2] Your choice.
[pilot, in English] Target in sight. We'll arrive in 30 seconds.
Contact. Russian submarine looks like it's bugging out.
translation.it: Avvistato sottomarino russo, si sta allontanando.

translation.en: We have visual on Captain Collins on the roof.
translation.it: Vedo il capitano Collins sul tetto.

translation.en: Madam President.
They told me you were awake. It is good to see you, Captain.
translation.it: Mi hanno detto che era sveglia. È un piacere vederla, Capitano.

translation.en: Is Fort Greely--
[President] Greely's back up. Interceptors on standby.
And we're going to replace SBX-1 as soon as possible,
translation.it: E sostituiremo la SBX-1 appena possibile,

translation.en: but don't worry, nobody is going to send you back out there.
translation.it: ma non si preoccupi, nessuno la rimanderà laggiù.

translation.en: In fact, I think a soldier of your caliber
translation.it: Anzi, un soldato del suo calibro

translation.en: would be better put to use on my National Security staff.
What do you say?
[President] I'll take that as a yes.
Thank you, Madam President.
Oh, and you have another visitor.
-Papa? -JJ.
I… I thought you were…
Turns out your dad has some very well-armed Army buddies
translation.it: A quanto pare, tuo padre aveva dei commilitoni armati

translation.en: watching over him in that retirement home.
translation.it: a vegliare su di lui in casa di riposo.

translation.en: They saw what was happening on TV. Broke down my goddamn door.
translation.it: Hanno visto ciò che accadeva in TV e mi hanno sfondato la porta.

translation.en: Saved my finger. Lost my door.
translation.it: Ho ancora il dito, ma non la porta.

translation.en: Well, I'll expect you to report to the White House next week, Captain.
translation.it: Capitano, la aspetto a rapporto alla Casa Bianca la prossima settimana.

translation.en: Come here. Dad.
This is for you.
Another survivor.
SEAL team found him swimming around the wreckage of SBX-1.
translation.it: I SEAL l'hanno trovato che nuotava tra i resti della SBX-1.

translation.en: He belonged to Corporal Shah.
[father sighs] I heard what happened. I'm sorry.
translation.it: Ho saputo cos'è successo. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: You know, sometimes it's…
it's best to talk about those we've lost so we don't forget.
translation.it: parlare di chi abbiamo perso per non dimenticarcene.

translation.en: His name was Rahul.
[father] Rahul?
He liked poker…
[father] I see.
…but he wasn't very good at it.
